title: Strengthening Web Development Competencies: 4C/ID Model-Based Digital Integration Education for Electrical Circuits

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply Ohm’s Law to calculate current-voltage relationships in series/parallel circuits.
Learners achieve the ability to interpret electrical circuit diagrams and convert them into actual circuit configurations.
Learners can experimentally analyze changes in circuit characteristics using digital simulation tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
